entry.title: Going Isomorphic with Django and React
entry.summary:
Description

In web development, an isomorphic application is one whose code (in this case, JavaScript) can run both in the server (in this case, Django) and the client. In this talk we will understand how it works and why it can be useful in the daily life. This talk is for developers (both backenders and frontenders) who believe in “DRY” and will love to learn something new.
